snippet: The fund, which will focus on investments in North America, attracted $6.5 billion from outside investors, exceeding its target of $6 billion, a person briefed on the matter said.
abstract: The fund, which will focus on investments in North America, attracted $6.5 billion from outside investors, exceeding its target of $6 billion, a person briefed on the matter said.

headline.main: Bain Capital Raises $7.3 Billion for Buyout Fund
